moduleDesc: A module for DramaCool.vc, 'Dramacool | Asian Drama, Movies and Shows'. Here's your KDrama.

mainPage.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(lastEpisodes,lastAnimes) { this.lastEpisodes = lastEpisodes; this.lastAnimes = lastAnimes; } function LastAnimes(moduleID,image,link,title) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; } function LastEpisodes(moduleID,image,link,title,episode) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.episode = episode; } function MainPageObject(request,headers,method,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.headers = headers; this.method = method; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113024421'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var mainPageObject; var output; var lastAnimes = []; var lastEpisodes = []; var movies = document.querySelector('div.block-tab > div.block.tab-container > div.tab-content.left-tab-2 > ul').querySelectorAll('li > a'); for (let x=0; x<movies.length; x++) { let movie = movies[x]; let title = movie.querySelector('h3').innerText; let image = movie.querySelector('img').getAttribute('data-original'); let link = movie.href; let episode = 'Movie'; var episodeObject = new LastEpisodes(moduleID, image, link, title, episode); lastEpisodes.push(episodeObject); } var dramas = document.querySelector('div.block-tab > div.block.tab-container > div.tab-content.left-tab-1 > ul').querySelectorAll('li > a'); for (let x=0; x<dramas.length; x++) { let drama = dramas[x]; let title = drama.querySelector('h3').innerText; let image = drama.querySelector('img').getAttribute('data-original'); let preLink = drama.href; let split1 = preLink.split('-episode'); let split2 = split1[0].split('/'); let link = 'https://dramacool.vc/drama-detail/'+split2[3]; var animeObject= new LastAnimes(moduleID, image, link, title); lastAnimes.push(animeObject); } while (lastEpisodes.length % 2 != 0) { lastEpisodes.push(lastEpisodes[0]); } while (lastAnimes.length % 3 != 0) { lastAnimes.push(lastAnimes[0]); } output = new Output(lastEpisodes,lastAnimes); mainPageObject = new MainPageObject('',headers,'',extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(mainPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

search.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID,image,link,title,type,voice,stars) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.type = type; this.voice = voice; this.stars = stars; } function SearchObject(request,method,headers,separator,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.separator = separator; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; this.title = title; } function savingtitle(title) { this.title = title; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113024421'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')];var savedtitle = []; var searchPageObject; var output = []; var data = document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block-tab > div > div > ul').querySelectorAll('li'); for(var i = 0; i < data.length; i++){ var dota = data[i]; var link = 'https://dramacool.vc' + dota.querySelector('a').href; var title = dota.querySelector('a').innerText; var pic = link.split('/drama-detail/'); var realpiclink = 'https://cdn.videokvid.com/cover/' + pic[1] + '.png';savedtitle.push(new savingtitle(title)) var type = 'Source:'; var voice = 'dramacool.vc'; var stars = 'MOVIE/DRAMA'; var searchObject = new Output (moduleID , realpiclink , link , title , type , voice , stars); output.push(searchObject); } searchPageObject = new SearchObject('','',headers,'+',extraInfo,'','',output , savedtitle); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(searchPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

info.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID,image,link,title,description,genres,type,status,episodes) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.description = description; this.genres = genres; this.type = type; this.status = status; this.episodes = episodes; } function Episodes(link,moduleID,isDecodable) { this.link = link; this.moduleID = moduleID; this.isDecodable = isDecodable; } function InfoObject(request,method,headers,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113024421'; var headers = [new Header('', '')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var infoObject; var output; var episodes = []; var datas = document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block-tab > div > div > ul').querySelectorAll('li'); for(var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++){ var data = datas[i]; var episodeamount = 'https://dramacool.vc' + data.querySelector('a').href; episodes.push(new Episodes(episodeamount , moduleID , 'false')); } var type = ''; var status = ''; var genres = ['Actors:']; var image = document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.details > div.img > img').src; var title = document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.details > div.info > h1').innerText; var actors = document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.slider-star').querySelectorAll('a'); for(var x= 0; x < actors.length; x++){ var data = actors[x]; var names = data.innerText; genres.push(names); } document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.details > div.info > h1').remove(); document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.details > div.info > div > span').remove(); document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.details > div.info > p:nth-child(3) > span').remove(); var desc = document.querySelector('body > div.container > div > div.content-left > div.block > div.details > div.info').innerText; episodes.reverse(); output = new Output(moduleID,image,parsedJson.request,title,desc,genres,type,status,episodes); infoObject = new InfoObject('','get',headers,extraInfo,'', '',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(infoObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

episodes.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(link,linkIdentifier,moduleID,isDecodable,headers) { this.link = link; this.linkIdentifier = linkIdentifier; this.moduleID = moduleID; this.isDecodable = isDecodable; this.headers = headers; } function EpisodeObject(request,method,headers,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113024421'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var episodeObject; var output = []; var data = document.querySelector('.anime_muti_link > ul').querySelectorAll('li'); for (let x = 0; x<data.length; x++) { let link = data[x].getAttribute('data-video'); var linkIdentifier = ''; if (!link.includes('http')){ link = 'https:'+link; } if (link.includes('streamtape.com')) { link = link.replace('streamtape.com', 'streamta.pe'); } output.push(new Output(link, linkIdentifier, moduleID, 'false', headers)); } episodeObject = new EpisodeObject('','',headers,extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(episodeObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;
